column1: scanline shimmer running diagonally across frame
chromatic aberration splitting edges into red and cyan halos
analog noise bloom pulsing like static aurora
vhs tracking lines drifting through horizon
color bleed smearing bright tones like wet ink
jpeg block artifacts forming digital masonry
pixel drag trails echoing motion through space
compression ghosts rippling behind objects
oversaturated bloom from cheap lens flare
datamosh melt blending sky into ground
video feedback tunnel spiraling toward vanishing point
signal desync producing ghost double image
glitch bands tearing through midground
raster burn creating soft magenta scars
color shift oscillating between neon and sepia
crushed blacks hiding faint grid patterns
temporal jitter blurring outlines like time stutter
degraded tape edge vignetting into darkness
frame drop effect freezing clouds mid-motion
crt glow haloing high-contrast forms
